titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation Tho. Cantuar. J. Sommers C.S. Shrewsbury. Dorset. Whereas we have received information upon oath, that the persons hereafter mentioned have committed high treason in clipping and counterfeiting the current coin of this kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
